author: jcorvel
msg: On Windows, make it possible to build Subversion against Serf 1.3.0 and
higher by allowing compilation against an already compiled serf.
(_find_serf): Set is_src to False when version >= 1.3.0.

author: oheger
msg: This method is now replaced by the functionality of the ConversionHandler to

author: oheger
msg: Added a property for the conversion handler to BasicBuilderProperties.
It is now possible to specify the ConversionHandler of a configuration when a
builder is used to create the configuration.
